archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.6.2a: a) mitigating all or part of the risk (e.g. by increasing the effectiveness of existing information security controls; eliminating redundant or ineffective controls; or implementing new security controls)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
